message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within my budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $95?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
